title: Ranked is unfair
body:
When I win a game i only gain 17 lp and when i lose a game i drop like 21 lp my mmr is well above the current rank and im not in a losing strike
how the fck does that work riot fix this shit and i always get inting teammate and now im fking inting everygame now cause this fking ranked have no game expercience so fking bad

replies.body:
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Jasonsu

You are on a 10games deficit. It wont be normal untill you reach that 50/50 mark.
